Module com.example.rupizzeria
Package managers

Class StoreManager

java.lang.Object
managers.StoreManager
public class StoreManager extends Object
This singleton class stores and manages all the orders in this restaurant, as well as the database for storing order history
Author:
Michael Liu, Genfu Liu

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Order
    currentOrder
    The current order that the user is about to place
    private static StoreManager
    instance
    This class implements the Singleton pattern for easier access of this class throughout the entire program as well as limiting multiple instance of it to be created since this application will most likely only need 1 store manager.
    private final StoreOrder
    orderHistory
    Instance of the StoreOrder class that stores the order history of the restaurant

  • Field Details

    • instance

      private static StoreManager instance
      This class implements the Singleton pattern for easier access of this class throughout the entire program as well as limiting multiple instance of it to be created since this application will most likely only need 1 store manager.

      private final StoreOrder orderHistory
      Instance of the StoreOrder class that stores the order history of the restaurant
